TopicTitle: 77 Industries: Aircraft Carrier "Beeblebrox". Stock Parts. Late Beta Version

Articles.Content:
**77 Industries Presents:**

My little aircraft carrier. 

It's the first ship I've ever released.

 It uses stock parts but because stock water is totally nuts, for best results you should use Ferram's "Better Buoyancy".

[https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/464/Better%20Buoyancy](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/464/Better%20Buoyancy)

Remember: this is a late beta but due to popularity on Reddit I've decided to release it early. I'd appreciate some constructive criticism :-)

Stats: see IMGUR album.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/aaSyU)

Download link: 

[http://kerbalx.com/crafts/3774](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/3774)

I need to spred some rep around before I give you more!

OMG SO AWESOME!!!!!

> 
> Is the stock or modded?

The Mod is for the game , not the Craft ! ( Like FAR )
